skills.name: Toxic Avalanche
skills.description: [SP: 15][CD: 20s] Releases neurotoxins every 0.5s to deal 100% ATK of Lightning DMG to nearby enemies. Duration: 4.9s. Then unleash a powerful Toxic Mist that deals 700% ATK of Lightning DMG to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Sin Stalker
skills.description: Character's Move Speed buffs Physical and Elemental DMG of attacks. For every 10% Move Speed buff, gain 5.0% DMG (Max DMG buff: 35%). Character gains 20% Move Speed.
